text: Queen Alone is the second studio album by American R&B; singer Nicole Wray, released on September 23, 2016, by Big Crown Records. This is her first solo album in 18 years since her last album Make It Hot and her first under a new name, Lady Wray.http://www.thevinyldistrict.com/storefront/2016/09/graded-on- a-curve-lady-wray-queen-alone/ == Track listing == ==References== Category:2016 albums Category:Nicole Wray albums Category:Soul albums by American artists
title: Queen Alone
